text: Red Boats at Argenteuil is a painting by artist Claude Monet. It was painted in 1875. Argenteuil is a town northwest of Paris, France. Claude Monet painted different locations and objects in Argenteuil many times. The painting belongs to a museum in Paris, the Mus√©e de l'Orangerie in France.. Category:Landscape paintings Category:Paintings by Claude Monet Category:1870s paintings Category:Argenteuil
title: Red Boats at Argenteuil
